snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner said American troops should be allowed to engage in more planning and directing of military operations in the battle against the militant group.
abstract: House Speaker John Boehner, returning from trip to Middle East, says Obama administration has placed artificial constraints on American troops in Iraq and should allow military to take more direct role in operations against Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Speaker John A. Boehner said American troops should be allowed to engage in more planning and directing of military operations in the battle against the militant group.

headline.main: Boehner Calls for Expanded Role for U.S. Troops in Fighting ISIS in Iraq
headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Washington; Boehner Urges a Bigger Role for U.S. Troops Against ISIS

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
